TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DispatchOperation extends System.Object

summary.span: 用來修改或擴充服務端點中特定服務作業的執行行為。

span.span: Used to modify or extend the execution behavior of a specific service operation in a service endpoint.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是進行執行階段修改的位置以及範圍僅限一項服務作業之自訂擴充的插入點 The class is the location for run-time modifications and insertion point for custom extensions that are scoped to only one service operation. 若要修改合約中所有訊息的服務執行階段行為，請使用 類別。(To modify service run-time behavior for all messages in a contract, use the class.) 您可以使用自訂作業行為物件或更大範圍的行為來安裝 修改，以便用來修改整個合約中的作業。Install modifications using a custom operation behavior object or a behavior at a larger scope in order to modify operations across a contract. 您可以使用 屬性找出表示特定服務作業的 物件。Use the property to locate the object that represents a particular service operation. - 、、、、 和 屬性會各自取得該作業的值。The , , , , , and properties obtain the respective values for the operation. - 和 屬性會指定異動行為。The and properties specify transaction behavior. - 和 屬性會控制與 相關之使用者定義服務物件的存留期。The and properties control the lifetime of the user-defined service object relative to the . - 、 和 屬性可以用來明確控制訊息與物件之間的相互轉換。The , , and the properties enable explicit control over the conversion from messages to objects and vice versa. - 屬性會指定作業模擬層級。The property specifies the operation impersonation level. - 屬性會插入作業的自訂呼叫內容延伸。The property inserts custom call context extensions for the operation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . - 屬性會控制參數物件是否會在完成服務作業時進行處置。The property controls whether parameter objects are disposed when the service operation is completed. - 要插入自訂 Invoker 物件的 屬性。The property to insert a custom invoker object. - 屬性可以讓您插入可用來檢查或修改參數和傳回值的自訂參數偵測器。The property enables you to insert a custom parameter inspector that you can use to inspect or modify parameters and return values.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The associated object.

param.name: name
param.span: 分派作業的名稱，這個名稱會當做 集合的索引鍵使用。

span.span: The name of the dispatch operation.This is used as the key to the collection.

param.name: action
param.span: 將要建立這個分派作業的訊息動作。

span.span: The message action for which this dispatch operation is being created.

summary.span: 使用指定的分派執行階段、名稱和動作值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dispatch run-time, name, and action values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將這個建構函式用於遵循單向模式的服務作業。Use this constructor for a service operation that follows the one-way pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: public DispatchOperation (System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime parent, string name, string action, string replyAction);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime parent, string name, string action, string replyAction) cil managed

span.span: The associated object.
The name of the dispatch operation.

param.name: action
param.span: 將要建立這個分派作業的 SOAP 訊息動作。

span.span: The SOAP message Action for which this dispatch operation is being created.

param.name: replyAction
param.span: 與這個分派作業相關聯的回覆動作。

span.span: The reply action associated with this dispatch operation.

summary.span: 使用指定的分派執行階段、名稱、動作和回覆動作值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dispatch run-time, name, action, and reply action values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將這個建構函式用於遵循要求-回覆模式的服務作業。Use this constructor for a service operation that follows the request-reply pattern.

member this.AutoDisposeParameters : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定是否要自動處置參數。

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are to be automatically disposed.

value.span: 如果要自動處置參數，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameters are to be automatically disposed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性決定服務是否會在處理訊息時處置已建立的所有 參數 (輸入、輸出或參考參數)。This property determines whether the service disposes all parameters (input, output or reference parameters) that were created while processing a message. 預設值為 `true`。The default value is `true`. 將這個屬性設定為 `false`，可以避免系統處置資源。Set this property to `false` to prevent the system from disposing resources. 在這種情況下，您要負責處理參數存留期。In this case, you are responsible for the parameter lifetimes. 查看 事件，瞭解您是否需要在作業完成時處置參數。See the event if you need to dispose parameters when the operation completes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CallContextInitializers As SynchronizedCollection(Of ICallContextInitializer)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 用來定義一些方法的 物件集合，這些方法會透過叫用使用者程式碼的執行緒，啟用執行緒區域儲存區 (Thread Local Storage) 的初始化和回收處理。

span.span: A collection of objects that defines the methods that enable the initialization and recycling of thread-local storage with the thread that invokes user code.

value.span: 物件的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可加入自訂 物件，這些物件會將狀態加入至呼叫持續期間的呼叫內容，並且可以在呼叫完成之後、而在傳回訊息之前擷取這個狀態。Use the property to add custom objects that add state to the call context for the duration of the call and can retrieve it subsequent to the completion of the call but prior to returning the message.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否使用 屬性值還原序列化要求訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property value is used to deserialize the request message.

value.span: 如果傳回類型是 類型，而且沒有 out 參數，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the return type is of type and there are no out parameters; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可控制格式器要從傳入訊息還原序列化該傳回值，或是要將傳入訊息直接傳回做為傳回值。Use the property to control whether the formatter deserializes the return value from an inbound message or whether the inbound message is returned directly as the return value. - **附註**如果`false`，傳回的類型必須是型別的而且不可以有 out 參數或會在執行階段擲回。**Note** If `false`, the return type must be of type and there can be no out parameters or an is thrown at run-time.

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the specified SOAP faults for this operation.

value.span: 針對這項作業所指定之 SOAP 錯誤的集合。

span.span: A collection of SOAP faults specified for this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可取得所有針對合約所指定之 SOAP 錯誤的集合。Use the property to get a collection of all contractually specified SOAP faults.

summary.span: 取得或設定格式器，這個格式器會將訊息還原序列化為物件以及將物件序列化為訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatter that deserializes messages into objects and serializes objects into messages.

value.span: 實作。

span.span: An implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可插入作業的自訂 實作或修改目前的格式器。Use the property to insert a custom implementation for an operation or modify the current formatter. 在強型別訊息作業的情況下，格式器的使用方式可以透過 和 屬性來控制。In the case of strongly-typed message operations, the use of the formatter can be controlled by the and properties. 介面會定義和方法，用來將一組物件參數的訊息與訊息至一組傳回的值，分別。The interface defines the and methods, which are used to convert a set of object parameters to a message and from a message to a set of return values, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可插入自訂 實作或修改目前的實作。Use the property to insert a custom implementation or to modify the current one. 參數偵測器會依照加入要求之集合的順序，以及依照回覆的相反順序叫用。Parameter inspectors are invoked in the order in which they are added to the collection for requests and in the reverse order for replies.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定 物件是否要序列化回覆訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the object serializes reply messages.

value.span: 如果 屬性會將傳回值序列化為回覆訊息，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property serializes the return values into a reply message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可指示格式器是否將作業參數序列化為回覆訊息，或是否將第一個參數當做傳出訊息來傳送。Use the property to indicate whether the formatter serializes operation parameters into a reply message or whether the first parameter is sent as the outbound message. > [!NOTE] > 如果設定為 `false`，則作業的傳回值必須屬於 類型，否則會擲回例外狀況。If set to `false`, the return value of the operation must be of type or an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定目前異動是否在作業成功傳回時自動完成。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current transaction automatically completes when the operation returns successfully.

value.span: 如果作業會在成功傳回時自動完成，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operation automatically completes on successful return; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定作業是否必須在異動中執行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the operation must execute within a transaction.

value.span: 如果作業必須在交易範圍內執行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operation must execute within the scope of a transaction; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，WCF 會將目前的交易設定為用來接收訊息，使用交易的傳輸; 如果在交易或交易流動透過通道，如果訊息具有交易時，或發送器會建立新的。If the property is `true`, WCF sets the current transaction to the transaction used to receive the message if using a transacted transport; or the transaction flowed over the channel if the message had a transaction; or the dispatcher will create a new one.
